Package net.sf.sprockets.widget

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GooglePlaceAutoComplete.OnPlaceClickListener
    Callback to invoke when a place in autocomplete suggestions is clicked.
    ListScrollListeners.OnScrollApprover
    Approves or rejects requests from OnScrollListeners to execute their onScroll implementation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FadingActionBarScrollListener
    Fades the ActionBar title and background from transparent to opaque while scrolling down the list.
    FloatingHeaderScrollListener
    Slides a View that floats above your list header(s) up and down along with the scrolling of the list.
    GooglePlaceAutoComplete
    AutoCompleteTextView that provides local suggestions from the Google Places API.
    GooglePlacesAdapter
    Adapter for a list of places, likely received from a Places method.
    GridCard
    Measurements for the content area (full area minus padding) of an R.drawable.image_card in a GridView.
    ListScrollListeners
    Forwards AbsListView.OnScrollListener events to the added listeners.
    ListScrollListeners.ObservingScrollListener
    Registers itself as a DataSetObserver for the list's adapter.
    ListViews
    Utility methods for working with ListViews.
    ParallaxViewScrollListener
    Synchronises the scrolling of a View with a ListView, at a speed relative to the list scrolling speed.
    ResourceEasyCursorAdapter
    Casts the Cursor to an EasyCursor.
    ResourceReadCursorAdapter
    Casts the Cursor to a ReadCursor.
    SearchViews
    Utility methods for working with SearchViews.
